text: Ian Bruce Turpie (6 November 1943 â€“ 11 March 2012) was an Australian actor and television and presenter. He was best known for hosting the Australia version of the long-running game show The New Price Is Right. Turpie died in Narraweena, New South Wales, Australia from throat cancer, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== *Ian Turpie official website * Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from Melbourne
